title: Stasis (Patch 2.1.0.6) (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
1. Run "patch_stasis_2.1.0.6.exe"
2. Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS GAME! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Change log:
Patch 1.0.8.10b
â€‹â€¢ Made sure Largest font scales on all resolutions.
â€‹â€¢ FIXED 1.0.7 SAVE GAME BUG
â€‹â€¢ Altered mouse clicking loop pause.
â€‹â€¢ Removed selection highlighter when scrolling through save games.
â€‹â€¢ Spelling change: Retracts.
â€‹â€¢ Fixed bug causing John to walk out of Jupiter passage.
â€‹â€¢ Changed color of cryopreservation fluid container.
â€‹â€¢ Removed descriptions when game state changes in hanger room.
â€‹â€¢ Added 3 different options of font size. Added ability to make more font sizes.
â€‹â€¢ Added additional animation when John interacts with Yuri.
â€‹â€¢ Increased interactive area when walking into clone vats.
â€‹â€¢ Fixed bug when coming back into annex.
â€‹â€¢ Increased Dr Malans walking speed from 60 - 75to avoid sliding.
â€‹â€¢ Increased size of trigger area for Stasis storage room door trigger.
â€‹â€¢ Moved door trigger to 'my heart' dialog.
â€‹â€¢ Fixed Russian and Polish missing text logs for Akiza Tenschu
â€‹â€¢ Added text size control driven by Stasis Config Tool.
â€‹â€¢ Reset minimum timing from 10ms to 50ms to avoid pause errors.
â€‹â€¢ Added in loop to push timing events that may skip because of faster cards and refresh rates.
â€‹â€¢ Fixed VSync issues encountered with Omega Series and Catalyst 15 (from AMD) cards. Tested on older NVidia drivers as well.
â€‹â€¢ No errors on Mac VSync/Refresh rates - but newer version with changes will still be built for Mac.
â€‹â€¢ Fixed missing descriptions in decontamination room.
â€‹â€¢ Forced control return when elevator platform moves on gangway in Seed.
â€‹â€¢ Added in command to make sure that new text size loads in older save games.
â€‹â€¢ Remove desorption's on power cells after interaction
â€‹â€¢ Redo menu screen (updated graphics and removing options menu - options are now adjusted in the Stasis Config Tool)
â€‹â€¢ Removed 'Sound Volume Control' from General System as it is replaced by Stasis Config Tool commands.
â€‹â€¢ Altered following graphics and text locations to allow for new next sizes:
â€‹â€¢ Tram Terminal, Tram Control, Tram Line Box, Tram Power Box, Specimen Transport Containers, Pod Control, Retinal Scanner
â€‹â€¢ Took out frames of security camera from older build
â€‹â€¢ Increased Exit Area in Crew Quarters Corridor B
â€‹â€¢ Got rid of odd 1's - (being caused by 'At beginning of scene;{_' in Medical and Hydroponics. Only found in Russian and Polish.
â€‹â€¢ Change credits with updated names
â€‹â€¢ Made smaller steps in background sounds fading out during dialog (from 5 to 10)
â€‹â€¢ Took out Menu Access when viewing pod panels in Product Storage Medical. Added in check to ensure John regains movement in room.
â€‹â€¢ Removed menu access during Surgery Loading Screen
â€‹â€¢ Took out 'mouse reset loop' during Helix sections
â€‹â€¢ Altered dialog spacing to fit larger text in Specimen Transport pod
â€‹â€¢ Added reduncancy check to surgery scene to give back control after surgery
â€‹â€¢ Altered 'MainFontSMALL' as it was causing issues with random numbers appearing (size and colour)
â€‹â€¢ Changed version number to graphic instead of text
â€‹â€¢ Old EXIT button wasnt working with old save games - fixed
